Ring

A ring is a piece of equipment worn on one of the hero's ring slots in Remixed Dungeon. Rings provide ongoing passive benefits that enhance specific aspects of the hero's performance.

Ring Types

  • Ring of Haggler - Reduces shop prices
  • Ring of Shadows - Improves stealth and reduces visibility
  • Ring of Regeneration - Regenerates health over time
  • Ring of Accuracy - Improves hit chance in combat
  • Ring of Elements - Provides resistance to elemental damage
  • Ring of Evasion - Improves dodge chance
  • Ring of Force - Increases melee damage
  • Ring of Frost - Chills enemies on hit
  • Ring of Haste - Improves movement speed
  • Ring of Wealth - Increases valuable item drops
  • Ring of Stone Blood - Converts damage to HP
  • Ring of Thorns - Reflects some damage back to attackers

Ring Properties

  • Durability: Rings degrade over time and eventually break
  • Upgrade: Rings can be upgraded with Scroll of Upgrade
  • Identification: Rings must be identified to reveal their properties
  • Slots: The hero can wear two rings simultaneously

Special Mechanics

  • Degradation: Rings slowly lose durability over time
  • Upgrading: Increases effectiveness and extends durability
  • Identification: Unidentified rings show only generic properties

Acquisition

Rings can be found in:

  • Chests throughout the dungeon
  • Special level rooms
  • Enemy drops
  • Shops - Purchased from shopkeepers
  • Alchemy - Created through transmutation

Strategy

  • Prioritize rings that complement your class and playstyle
  • Consider upgrading valuable rings to extend their life
  • Manage ring slots carefully since they're permanent equipment slots
  • Replace rings when better options become available

See Also

  • Rings - General rings page
  • Equipment - Other equipment items
  • Enchantments - Similar magical properties
  • Combat - Combat mechanics affected by rings
